info.name: Reddit - Easy Hide Links + Other Small Tweaks
info.description: Adds a way to hide links on reddit easier ( shamelessly ripped off of style 45085, except his didn't work for me ), as well as other little things. Isn't perfect but it's what I use and you can too. I suggest you install the brilliant style 36717 as well, as that's what I use and while I check for compatibility with normal reddit, it'll all just look better if you use that.
info.additionalInfo:
Ver 1.1106051 - Forgot to edit the sidebar for ads, since I had adblock on for reddit. D'oh. Remember to disable adblock for reddit kids :)

Ver 1.110605 - Now on comments page you don't get the hide link thingy any more. Oh, and you can actually submit a link now.
